scripts.build: bun run types && bun run nuxt build
scripts.check: bun run types && bun run build && bun run format && bun run lint && bun run typecheck
scripts.deploy: bun run types && bun run build && bun run wrangler deploy
scripts.dev: bun run types && bun run nuxt dev
scripts.format: bun run biome format --write && bun run trunk fmt -a
scripts.generate: bun run types && bun run nuxt generate
scripts.lint: bun run biome check --write && bun run trunk check -a
scripts.packages: bun run rimraf node_modules bun.lock && bun install
scripts.postinstall: bun run types && bun run nuxt prepare
scripts.preview:cloudflare: bun run types && bun run build && wrangler dev
scripts.preview:nuxt: bun run types && bun run nuxt preview
scripts.reset: bun run clean && bun run packages && bun run build
